mapper.insert: insert into t_frame_audit (frame_id, dataset_id, create_person,create_time, path, target_id, auditor, audit_time,type,classcontent,scenecontent,tagcontent,status,classlist,scenelist,taglist,update_time,update_person) values (#{frame_id},#{dataset_id},#{create_person},#{create_time},#{path},#{target_id},#{auditor},#{audit_time},#{type},#{classcontent},#{scenecontent},#{tagcontent},#{status},#{classlist},#{scenelist}, #{taglist}, #{update_person}, #{update_time})
mapper.update: update t_frame_audit set frame_id=#{frame_id} ,dataset_id=#{dataset_id},create_person=#{create_person},create_time=#{create_time},path=#{path},target_id=#{target_id},auditor=#{auditor},audit_time=#{audit_time},type=#{type},classcontent=#{classcontent},scenecontent=#{scenecontent},tagcontent=#{tagcontent},status=#{status},classlist=#{classlist},scenelist=#{scenelist},taglist=#{taglist},update_person=#{update_person},update_time=#{update_time} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_frame_audit a where a.id=#{id}
